TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>
Public Structure KeyTime Implements IEquatable(Of KeyTime)

summary.span: 在動畫的相對進程期間， 執行個體會指定特定主要畫面格應該發生的確切時間。

span.span: During the relative course of an animation, a instance specifies the precise timing when a particular key frame should take place.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個主要畫面格的指定該主要畫面格的結束時。Each key frame's specifies when that key frame ends. 它不會指定多久的關鍵時間播放。It does not specify how long the key time plays. 主要畫面格的播放時間量取決於主要畫面格的結束時間、前一個主要畫面格的結束時間，以及動畫的持續期間。The amount of time a key frame plays is determined by when the key frame ends, when the previous key frame ended, and the animation's duration. 請參閱[主要畫面格動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md) for more information. A可能會以數個不同的格式，包括以百分比表示，或做為其中一個特殊的 sentinel 值的數值的時間值，表示或。A may be expressed in several different formats, including a numeric time value, as a percentage, or as one of the special sentinel values or . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*物件\*\*屬性*="[*天*。]*小時*:*分鐘*:*秒*[。*fractionalSeconds*]"/ >\<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/> -或--or- \<*物件\*\*屬性*="[*天*。]*小時*:*分鐘*"/ >\<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/> -或--or- \<*object* *property*="*pctValue*%"/>\<*object* *property*="*pctValue*%"/> -或--or- \<*物件\*\*屬性*= 「"/ >\<*object* *property*=""/> -或--or- \<*物件\*\*屬性*= 「"/ >\<*object* *property*=""/> ## XAML 值XAML Values *天**days* 整數值大於或等於 0，指定由此跨越的天數。An integer value greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the number of days spanned by this . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *時數**hours* 指定由這個合併的時數的整數值介於 0 到 23 之間。An integer value between 0 and 23 that specifies the number of hours spanned by this . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *分鐘的時間**minutes* 指定由這個合併的分鐘數的整數值介於 0 到 59 之間。An integer value between 0 and 59 that specifies the number of minutes spanned by this . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *秒數**seconds* 指定由這個合併的秒數的浮點值介於 0 到 59 之間。A floating-point value between 0 and 59 that specifies the number of seconds spanned by this . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *fractionalSeconds**fractionalSeconds* 指定整數值 1 至 7 位數所組成的小數秒數。An integer value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that specifies fractional seconds. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *pctValue**pctValue* 指定的浮點值介於 0 到 100 (含)，動畫的總持續時間的百分比。A floating-point value between 0 and 100, inclusive, that specifies this as a percentage of the animation's total duration. 這必須緊接著常值字元`%`。如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。This should be followed by the literal character `%`.For more information, see the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Paced As KeyTime

summary.span: 取得 值，該值建立計時行為，因而產生以常數速率進行插補的動畫。

span.span: Gets the value which creates timing behavior resulting in an animation that interpolates at a constant rate.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當索引鍵時間設定為，根據每個主要畫面格，以判斷每個畫面格的持續時間的長度配置的可用時間。When a key time is set to , available time is allocated according to the length of each of the key frames to determine the duration of each frame. 這會提供，"velocity"或動畫的步調會保持不變的行為。This will provide the behavior that the "velocity" or pace of the animation will remain constant.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Percent As Double
public: property double Percent { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得主要畫面格的結束時間，以動畫總持續時間的百分比表示。

span.span: Gets the time when the key frame ends expressed as a percentage of the total duration of the animation.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當關鍵時間會以百分比表示時，主要畫面格結束時間指定主要畫面格動畫的持續時間的百分比。When a key time is expressed as a percentage, the key frame ending time is specified as a percentage of the duration of the key frame animation. 例如，如果主要畫面格動畫有四秒和 75%的持續時間指定為主要畫面格的百分比，第 3 秒之後，將結束的主要畫面格。For example, if a key frame animation has a duration of four seconds and 75% is given as the percentage for the key frame, the key frame will end after the 3rd second.

exception.span: 如果這個執行個體不是類型 。

span.span: If this instance is not of type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeSpan As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan TimeSpan { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 取得以動畫開始時間之相對時間表示的主要畫面格結束時間。

span.span: Gets the time when the key frame ends expressed as a time relative to the beginning of the animation.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當關鍵時間會表示為時間範圍內時，主要畫面格結束時間指定為相對於動畫開始時間。When a key time is expressed as a time span, the key frame ending time is specified as a time relative to the beginning of the animation. 比方說，如果時間範圍設定為"0:0:2 」 時，主要畫面格結尾是兩秒之後動畫開始。For example, if the time span is set to "0:0:2", the key frame will end two seconds after the animation begins.

exception.span: 如果這個執行個體不是類型 。

span.span: If this instance is not of type .

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

A value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Uniform As KeyTime

summary.span: 取得 值，這個值會在主要畫面格之間平均分佈指定的動畫時間。

span.span: Gets the value which divides the allotted time of the animation evenly between key frames.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當索引鍵時間設定為，主要畫面格之間平均分配分配動畫時間總計。When a key time is set to , the total allotted time of the animation is divided evenly between key frames. 比方說，如果主要畫面格動畫的持續時間為四秒，而且有四個主要畫面格，每個主要畫面格會持續一秒，並只有在前一個結束後，立即開始。For example, if the key frame animation has a duration of four seconds and there are four key frames, each key frame will last for one second and begin immediately after the preceding one ends.
